name: Easy Bake Coven
description:
Summary

A game where you're a little witch that runs a potion shop. You combine different ingredients to create various potions with different properties. Use the profits to purchase cosmetics, recipes, and ingredients. Your goal is to become the best, prettiest, and most popular potion shop in the witching world.

This game was made for a University of Houston course on Mobile App Development.

The Team

Our team consists of two people. Vivian Rolon created all of the coding for this game and designed some assets. Nabil Dale created most of the art for the game. The game and assets were created using Unity, C#, and Photoshop. 

Aaron Lehnen provided all of the audio.

Features

This game includes many features like potion crafting, ingredient inventory management,  ingredient and cosmetics shop, and character customization.
